circle.data-content: In the real world, we are an African-focused creative technology powerhouse. We deliver magic through Digital Marketing, Public Relations, Brand Design and Product Development.

rect.data-content: Here, we gleefully roll up our sleeves for the dirty work because this is where true creativity flourishes. For us, Grit and Grime births the sublime.

polygon.data-content: Our digital-native roots drive us to mine data-driven insights and develop marketing strategies that consistently inspire action and forge true customer loyalty.
From the trivial to the transformative, we solve challenges by balancing the powers of brand intelligence, creativity and efficiency at every stage of the solution.

circle.data-content: We’ve nurtutred young brands to explode across the African continent. We’ve masterminded the local entry of global brands. Our history speaks (loudly) for us

rect.data-content: We believe that consistently fresh ideas hold the key to growth. Working tirelessly to create brand waves in technology, business, art and culture is our religion.

circle.data-content: Keep an eye out for us on social media. Our full website will launch soon.
